tool_description:
This API retrieves data of virtual soccer from the Bet365 Brazil website, covering four leagues, excluding odds.

Number Leagues:
1 - copa
2 - euro
3 - super
4 - premier
name: bet365-futebol-virtual
title: bet365-futebol-virtual

api_list.name: To get many results for all leagues.
api_list.description: To get many results you need retrieved all leagues.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bet365-futebol-virtual.p.rapidapi.com/all/5"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bet365-futebol-virtual.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bet365-futebol-virtual.p.rapidapi.com/all/{quant_result}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bet365-futebol-virtual.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Many results per league
api_list.description:
To get more results of a specific league.
Choose a League and how many results you want to see.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bet365-futebol-virtual.p.rapidapi.com/last/league/3/7"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bet365-futebol-virtual.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bet365-futebol-virtual.p.rapidapi.com/last/league/{numberleague}/{quant_result}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bet365-futebol-virtual.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: To get last result of a league
api_list.description:
Retrieve the last result of a specific league. 
Just choice  a unique league.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bet365-futebol-virtual.p.rapidapi.com/last/league/2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bet365-futebol-virtual.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://bet365-futebol-virtual.p.rapidapi.com/last/league/{numberleague}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
